The procedure involved for Irish parents in inter-country adoptions. Requirements to be met by prospective adopting parents

Adoptive Benefit is a payment made to people on adoptive leave from work

People who adopt children may be entitled to leave from employment
Is féidir le daoine a uchtaíonn leanaí, saoire oibre a thógáil
This leave is called adoptive leave
Tugtar saoire uchtaíoch ar seo. Cad is brí le seo?
Find out what this means and how to apply
Agus conas is féidir leat iarratas a chur isteach ar shaoire uchtaíoch?
This document is in: Employment > Employment rights and conditions > Leave and holidays
This document is in: Fostaíocht > Cearta agus Coinníollacha Oibre > Saoire agus laethanta saoire

Surrogacy is a way for a childless couple or individual to have a child

Tuilleadh faisnéise a fháil
